text: Rainbow jersey The Men's team sprint at the 2011 UCI Para-cycling Track World Championships was held on March 13. 15 nations of 3 cyclists each participated in the contest. After the qualifying, the fastest 2 teams raced for gold, and 3rd and 4th teams raced for bronze. ==Results== Clasificaciones Montechiari 2011 domingo - Mixed Team Sprint C15 - Results and Final Classification , page 5, 6, 7, rfec.trackglobe.com ===Qualifying=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
